alert.note: Alert for Clay; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clay, northwestern Wilkin, southeastern Cass and northwestern Richland Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Horace, or 10 miles southwest of Fargo, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo, West Fargo, Horace, Kindred, Oxbow, Davenport and Walcott. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 41 and 68. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 336 and 351. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
